event_attack_stage.description: Searchable. Stage(s) of the cyber kill chain when an attack was terminated by sensor  Requires Endpoint Standard

event_description.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Event description calculated by the Carbon Black Cloud  Requires Endpoint Standard

event_id.description: Searchable. Unique event identifier assigned by the Carbon Black Cloud

event_threat_score.description: Searchable. Score(s) assigned by Carbon Black Cloud for the detected threat (Returns values 0-8)  Requires Endpoint Standard

event_timestamp.description: Searchable. Timestamp reported by the sensor when the event occurred
